languages.text: Enemies that become targets of the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} gain a stacking −5% {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} until the end of combat.
languages.original_text: Противники, ставшие целями {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосил{/g} псайкера, получают суммирующийся {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −5% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парированию{/g} до конца боя.

traits.locale_text: Enemies, that either take damage from the Psyker or become targets of the Psyker's psychic powers, gain a stacking −10% penalty to their dodge and parry until the end of combat.
Enemies that either take damage from the psyker or become targets of the psyker's psychic powers gain a stacking −10% penalty to their dodge and parry until the end of combat.

Enemies that become targets of the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} gain a stacking −5% {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} until the end of combat.

Enemies that become targets of the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}psychic powers{/g} gain a stacking −5% {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} until the end of combat.

Enemies that become targets of the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} gain a stacking −5% {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} until the end of combat.

languages.text: Противники, ставшие целями {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосил{/g} псайкера, получают суммирующийся {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −5% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парированию{/g} до конца боя.
languages.original_text: Enemies that either take damage from the psyker or become targets of the psyker's psychic powers gain a stacking −10% {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to their dodge and parry until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Противники, получившие урон от псайкера или ставшие целями его психосил, получают суммирующийся {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −10% к уклонению и парированию до конца боя.
Противники, получившие урон от псайкера или ставшие целями его психосил, получают суммирующийся {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −10% к уклонению и парированию до конца боя.

languages.text: 每当敌人成为{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能能力{/g}的目标时，该名敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}都会获得-5%{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。此效果可叠加，持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text: Enemies that become targets of the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} gain a stacking −5% {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: 每当敌人成为{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能能力{/g}的目标时，该名敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}都会获得-5%{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。此效果可叠加，持续至战斗结束。

languages.text: Los enemigos que sean objetivos de los {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poderes psíquicos{/g} del psíquico ganan una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} acumulativa del −5 % a su {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parada{/g} hasta el final del combate.
languages.original_text: Enemies that become targets of the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} gain a stacking −5% {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Los enemigos que sean objetivos de los {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poderes psíquicos{/g} del psíquico ganan una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} acumulativa del −5 % a su {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parada{/g} hasta el final del combate.

languages.text: Feinde, die entweder vom Psioniker getroffen werden oder zum Ziel der {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psionischen Kräfte{/g} des Psionikers werden, erleiden bis zum Ende des Kampfes einen stapelbaren {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −5 % auf ihre Fähigkeit zum {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parieren{/g}.
languages.original_text: Enemies that become targets of the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} gain a stacking −5% {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Feinde, die entweder vom Psioniker getroffen werden oder zum Ziel der {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psionischen Kräfte{/g} des Psionikers werden, erleiden bis zum Ende des Kampfes einen stapelbaren {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −5 % auf ihre Fähigkeit zum {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parieren{/g}.

languages.text: L'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} et la {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parade{/g} des ennemis ciblés par les {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoirs psychiques{/g} du psyker subissent une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −5 % jusqu'à la fin du combat.
languages.original_text: Enemies that become targets of the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} gain a stacking −5% {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: L'{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquive{/g} et la {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parade{/g} des ennemis auxquels le psyker inflige des dégâts ou qui sont la cible de ses pouvoirs psychiques subissent une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de -10 % jusqu'à la fin du combat.

languages.text: 異能者からダメージを受けるか、異能者の{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}サイキック・パワー{/g}のターゲットになった敵は、戦闘終了まで{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}に−5%の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}（スタック可）を受ける。
languages.original_text: Enemies that become targets of the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} gain a stacking −5% {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: 異能者からダメージを受けるか、異能者の{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}サイキック・パワー{/g}のターゲットになった敵は、戦闘終了まで{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}に−5%の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}（スタック可）を受ける。

languages.text: Ruhsezerin {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}ruhsezi güçlerinin{/g} hedefi olan düşmanlar, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}savuşturma{/g} değerlerine üst üste birikebilen −%5 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ceza puanı{/g} alırlar. Bu etki, çatışma sonuna dek sürer.
languages.original_text: Enemies that become targets of the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} gain a stacking −5% {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} until the end of combat.
